reviews.title: What's the point of an App?
reviews.text:
In theory, an app is created so that one may automate and create a more seamless experience for the end user. Maybe save some time, possibly create a tool that's useful. This experience may come in the form of ordering a taxi, food for your meal or a rideshare car. 

Allegedly that's what lalamove tried to do. But while the App may look shiny and is considerably user friendly, it fails in all other aspects that may suggest a more automated or seamless experience. Some examples- why did I get 8 missed calls from their customer service after using their App? Why was I not able to resolve the issue after the 4 subsequent calls with their team? Why were there multiple drivers calling me? Why didn't the driver correct call me in the first place? Why was I negotiating with the driver til close to midnight on the phone? 

While training and basic customer service etiquette seemed utterly devoid from my interaction with the lalamove team, it seems the biggest shortfall is in how NOT streamlined the experience is. What should have been a 1 minute App experience turned into a combined 3 hour ordeal. I hope the lalamove team gets it and fixes their approach to their service, as well as reconsider the end users' journey post-click. It Best of luck.

reviews.title: App hot garbage - Service great/great idea
reviews.text:
This app is a hot wet mess. It’s beta at best, and has not even gone through basic QA. I will say it’s functional, but only barely. You can’t make changes nor can the movers once they have accepted a job. So you have to contact support to remove one guy, so it frees up the spot to find another helper. Would benefit from some gui/spatial changes to make it more user friendly and/or less intimidating overall.

Visionary/executive/owner/coach?: Storyboard the entire application with branches of what goes to what storyboard. Then look at all your storyboards and redesign to cut the storyboards in half at least. 

The idea is great, and has potential to grab a return and expanding customer base. You have to bring customer engagement down, simplify the order process. It needs to be as easy as Uber/Lyft. A metric to shoot for is easier than Ubereats, that app is still a convoluted mess in places to accommodate all the different restaurants and what have you. You’re defining the service/service level so you can trim and shape to simplify/make brainless easy.

(AWS backend?)

reviews.title: Loading my truck
reviews.text:
This is a two part review: 
1. MoveIt is a complicated app… it would work better as a website, because any kind of contact or response isn’t easy. I contracted for 2 helpers, and 1 canceled at the last minute. The problem is: trying to get to a real person to get anything done didn’t happen. After Dylan, the helper that showed up tried contact you by phone, all we got was a voicemail. That doesn’t help me when I’m in need of a agreed second helper. Almost 3 hours later, you assigned another person, by it was too late. 
2. That being said, the guy that DID show up, Dylan was GREAT! Hard worker, and easy to get along with. I’m almost 68 years old, in decent health, but had I not been, this could have been a catastrophe. Too bad all your helpers aren’t as good as Dylan!

reviews.title: Junk removal - done right
reviews.text:
I had booked a Junk removal job. Booking through the app was easy. As soon as I uploaded my pictures Justin was available. He gave me a window of 5-5:30PM for pickup.

He arrived on time and helped move my couch, garden furniture and packing material quickly and professionally.

I did my research. Called several other movers. Many wanted to charge 40-50-% more. The guys at MoveIt were amazing. Best in town!

reviews.title: Flawless Experience
reviews.text: I contacted them for a rush next day pickup of a mattress and bed frame and was accommodated in a quick professional manner.  The movers were so nice and well groomed.  It was as a great experience and we will be using this company again when we move across town in December.

reviews.title: I can’t see to use it
reviews.text:
I signed up today to use the app and had to call my son to read the text to me. 

Font is way too small- there’s no way this is ADA compliant (No, I am not handicap).  I also had to dig around to find out someone accepted the job and now I am waiting.  Not sure what’s next.

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text:
Had 2 Great guys come and move 2 mattresses for me. Quick and professional. I trusted them completely. 

Linda H

reviews.title: Great company!
reviews.text: Move It was a wonderful company and they were able to help me out when I was in a pinch. They were quick to respond to my request, they were on time, they took the time to make sure my furniture was secured and handled it with care. I will definitely call them in the future!

reviews.title: GREAT work!!
reviews.text: These guys helped move a really heavy couch I had and all the workers were really polite and focused. And the app was really easy to use!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: The service was awesome! Loved how quick and efficient the move went. This service is definitely one that I would order again if I need anything moved again! Move it!

reviews.title: Great service!
reviews.text: These guys are very quick and reliable! They are straight to the point and worked with me to the best of their abilities when I asked them to specifically move things a certain way!

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.text: Used their service for a quick apartment move. Good communication. Fast service and handled all the furniture nicely. It would not let me edit my move once submitted however so just try to get everything right when creating the move

reviews.title: Awesome experience!
reviews.text:
I have never used this company but I am so pleased to have learned about them! 
They moved a heavy bedroom set for me, they were prompt and communication was great. It was short notice and I was nervous but they were quick and efficient. Thank you!

reviews.title: Move It is such a great service
reviews.text: These guys are awesome. Easy app to use and very quick. Will use whenever I need truck and muscle. Thank you!

reviews.title: The real deal
reviews.text: These guys showed up on time. Very professional, courteous and careful. Great customer service. I needed help coordinating getting four laborers to arrive at the same time. No problems!

reviews.title: Amazing service!!
reviews.text: They were fast and quick and very polite. Great workers and very great environment.

reviews.title: Unreal Service
reviews.text: Had a great experience! Showed up and got everything done in a timely matter, great help for me not having a truck! Thank you!!

reviews.title: Movers
reviews.text: I was referred to MOVE IT to have furniture moved to storage, it was great! A couple guys showed up and moved everything for me, all I had to do was show them what needed to be moved. I used them a second time to pick up a grill from the store. They picked it up and delivered to my house without any issues, I highly recommend MOVE IT for any moving needs you may have! Thanks guys!

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.text: This service was very convenient and reliable. Have used Move it a few different times and have had a great experience every time!

reviews.title: Move It App
reviews.text: This app is awesome! Really easy to use!

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.text:
Move It is amazing! I’ve had a 500 pound machine I needed to move for a few years. I asked my husband weekly to get it done and he wouldn’t.  Between being pregnant 2 times, raising 2 babies and working full time I didn’t have the time. Or muscles. Or a truck. 
My friend shared their link on Facebook and after waiting 3 years it was moved the next day!!!! 
They didn’t have my specific needs on their app, but I messaged them through Facebook and they took care of me. 
I wish I had known about them sooner. They would have been helpful the time I bought a chair at HomeGoods without thinking and ended up sitting on the curb with it looking for someone who could help me get it home. 
They are super fast, efficient and affordable.

reviews.title: New to Vegas
reviews.text:
Recently moved to Vegas and purchased some very heavy furniture which need to go up a curved flight of stairs!  The guys from Move It handled it like pros!!  Can’t say enough nice things.  Very professional, respectful, knowledgeable and friendly.  I will only use them from now on and would highly recommend them.
L. Davis

reviews.title: Kenny and Joshua
reviews.text: Had Kenny and Joshua as our Movers and they were absolutely wonderful they did the job very fast and they were both on time definitely going to use the service again!!! Thanks again! Ashley

reviews.title: Move It is GREAT
reviews.text: Outstanding! Pier One was closing down and I had to get the table and outside umbrella before they closed. Friend told me about Move It and their on demand service. Only gave them a 45 minute heads up. 2 helpers showed up on time, friendly, courteous, loaded my items and delivered to my house where I wanted it. Great service will definitely use again.

reviews.title: Great Service
reviews.text: Needed a mattress and some boxes moved. Excellent customer service, on time, professional, great prices. Highly recommend and will use again.

reviews.title: What An Awesome Company!
reviews.text: So far, I've used Move It twice (in the same week). The first time, they moved a large office desk, executive chair and fridge from an office park to my house. Today, they moved a grandfather clock I bought on Nextdoor from the seller's house to mine. They have professional employees who know how to wrap and transport items for local moves. They're dependable, efficient, and their prices are reasonable. They're still working out a few bugs in the app, but it's still easy to book your move. Try them. You'll be impressed.

reviews.title: Amazing movers!!
reviews.text: This was super fast and convenient. They had great prices and fast service. Will definitely use again!

reviews.title: Move it
reviews.text: Move it was fast, easy, and Drew & Alex were great!

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.text: Love this service! Easy to use and every worker has been extremely friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: Great job!!
reviews.text: They really moved my stuff!!! Great work.

reviews.title: The Best!!
reviews.text: Where has this app been my whole life!! Move It is the best! So easy, convenient, and affordable. Will definitely be using their services again. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of moving furniture.

reviews.title: Awesome service
reviews.text: I bought a grill and chair and they went to the store and picked it up and delivered the same day. The service was inexpensive and very professional.

reviews.title: Move It Rocks!
reviews.text: Had some things at my house that I wasn’t able to move due to not have a vehicle to accommodate and Move It took care of everything! Highly recommend using them. Extremely professional and got the job done quickly. Will definitely use again in the future.

reviews.title: Great Experience!
reviews.text: Used this app to help move into our new home and couldn’t have been any easier. Will definitely use again in the future.

reviews.title: Move
reviews.text: I have used MoveIt several times from picking up bulk items at stores to helping move furniture from one room to another. The service has always been top notch.

reviews.title: I like to move it move it
reviews.text: Great service! Fast and easy!

reviews.title: Best moving company out there!
reviews.text: These guys show up on time, work hard, and take great care of the things they are handling. Overall, they do an exceptional job and I will be using them for all my moving needs!

reviews.title: Move it
reviews.text: Move it was the easiest process and movement of my refrigerator and couches that I could have possibly imagined.  All workers were extra professional, delightful and extra safe.  Thank you move it, will definitely recommend to all I know!!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.text: Bought a rug and table from HomeGoods and needed help getting it home. Move It was fast to help pick up my new items and deliver it to my house. The guys were professional and affordable.

reviews.title: Thank you thank you thank you
reviews.text: Great service, quick, great people. Thank you. Will use again

reviews.title: Highly recommended!
reviews.text: I used Move It and had the best experience. I bought a table and chairs and they were able to pick up and deliver everything right away. When they delivered my new furniture they were able to move all my old stuff out to the garage! Thanks to them I don't have to bother my brother and can get everything I need done ASAP 🙌🏽. Will be using this company again and again!

reviews.title: Love Group Active
reviews.text: I have belonged to a gym for years that used the Mossa program then I moved away. So happy there’s an app I can still do my group active classes with Mossa. Thank you so much!

reviews.title: Good, needs a hamburger
reviews.text:
It would be helpful to have a hamburger menu to jump to workout sections.
Love MOSSA!

reviews.title: Best way to work out—so many options!
reviews.text: I did MOSSA workouts at my local YMCA for years prior to the pandemic. I was thrilled when they made the app available for anyone to sign up during COVID times. Now I can work out whenever I want to. there are so many different workouts to choose from. Even after years of using the app I am finally exploring all the options. My only beef with the app is that the user needs to be able to organize favorites in some usable way: type of workout, by time of work workout, etc. with my comments attached.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: Absolutely amazing library - I recommend to everyone!

reviews.title: Great workouts
reviews.text: These are the same classes I take at the gym.  The instructors are top notch.  I love the convenience of working out at home.

reviews.title: MOSSA ROCKS!
reviews.text: Group Power, Group Active, 3D-30, and really anything Mossa is fantastic.  Programming and music are second to none.  Mossa on Demand got me through the pandemic.  The workouts change your body and your mind!

reviews.title: Terrible App
reviews.text: Signed up for live previews of new releases. Couldn’t get on even though I refreshed everything. This happens all the time. I’m canceling for good this time

reviews.title: Greta value for a great workout
reviews.text: I used to be a regular at my gym that had MOSSA classes and then moved to a small town with the closest gym 30 minutes away. I am so happy to get the same experience at home and even workout with a trainer from my old gym (hi Mark!) The cost of the subscription (and equipment for Power) for the variety of regularly updated content is totally worth it.

reviews.title: Great at home workout!
reviews.text:
I’ve been a subscriber for at least 5 years and I still love this program!  There are so many options and there is something for everyone and all fitness levels.  I highly recommend this to anyone, especially if you’re looking for something that you can use any day of the week.  I’ve done the R30 (spin), Power, Core, Blast, and Centergy.  
The instructors are top notch and the workouts are very easy to follow.   5 stars from me!!

reviews.title: Love MOSSA!!!
reviews.text: MOSSA workouts are the best! The music is always great, and I love how the workout is choreographed to the beat. Makes the workout so much more enjoyable and effective. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.text: This app is reasonably priced and has a lot of variety with and without equipment.

reviews.title: Great Fitness Program
reviews.text: I have been using MOSSA On Demand for almost 3 years now and it is amazing. The workouts are varied and can be modified for any fitness level. They are constantly updating workouts and adding content. They also have segments that explain the reasons behind the different types of movements and programs. Technologically, there has been no issues. The videos play and the audio is excellent. I would highly recommend this program.

reviews.title: Nice but could use more variety
reviews.text: All workouts seem exactly the same

reviews.title: So flexible and full group classes when I want them!
reviews.text: I had joined MOSSA in April 2020 because I loved the classes at the gym I belonged to so thought I’d try out the app.  It was okay but there weren’t very many classes on the app at that time.  Fast forward to NOW and I’m absolutely amazed at all the class offerings and options (those combo classes - what?!?)!  I’m so excited to get back at it from home.  It still feels like I’m in a group class at the gym but I can do it on my schedule.  Thank you MOSSA!!

reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!!!
reviews.text: Fun and motivating workouts ‼️  Absolutely the best instructors ‼️  Thank you Mossa ‼️

reviews.title: So glad to have this on demand!
reviews.text:
As a former Mossa instructor, I was looking for a fitness option when I travel. So many of these programs do not require equipment OR I can use it at a gym using their equipment.
I also dusted off my equipment at home, from my instructor days, so I can do Group Active and Group Power at home, where there are no facilities within a reasonable distance that offer these amazing Mossa programs. I do however miss the community you get in the live group fitness setting.
Thank you Mossa!

reviews.title: Pretty fun!
reviews.text: A good way to get moving without it feeling like a chore. I do the group centergy and group fight

reviews.title: Great workouts, nice app
reviews.text:
This 70 year old guy loves the 60 min group power workout sessions. They are really good for me. I do one every four days on the same session for 6 times and then move the next one in the series. Finally up to #19.. It's amazing how they are all different but equally good. Kudos to the session leaders !!
Also - the workouts are best on a big screen (apple TV) but in a pinch the iPad screen will still get you going just fine...

reviews.title: Love the De-Desk Your Body Program
reviews.text: I’m not one of those fitness freaks. I love the ease of getting into this app and finding workouts that fit my pace. Great music too

reviews.title: Love my MOSSA home gym and app!
reviews.text: Used to drag myself to the gym for MOSSA, but with 3 kids and a full time job, it rarely fit my schedule. Now I wake up at 4:30 every morning and pick whatever MOSSA program I’m in the mood for! My favorites are Centergy, Power, Active, R30, and Fight (I’ll also Groove on occasion). So grateful to have this!

reviews.title: Best Workout App
reviews.text: This app has it all. So grateful for the variety and quality of these workouts. No getting bored or tired of seeing the same leader. No matter what your fitness goals are MOSSA has an answer for you.

reviews.title: Wicked Awesome Workout App
reviews.text:
I downloaded this app at the beginning of COVID because my Gym shut down and these were the workouts they used.  I bought the equipment, but they even have routines if you don’t.  Instructors and routines are all great, and they can be modified for any level.  What I like best is they have 10 minute, 30 minute and roughly 60 minute workouts, so they fit into what ever schedule you have.

Love this app!

reviews.title: Not happy with most recent version
reviews.text:
I am not sure what happened. Things got worse.
1. I can no longer control the class within the app using my wireless headphones. I used to be able to pause by touching my headphones.
2. The fast forward button during a class skips me to the next class I have downloaded.
3. I can’t find a way to skip ahead a few seconds or behind a few seconds without trying to manually move the timeline.

Perhaps this is something on my end, but it is corresponding to a new look in the app. It is much less user friendly.

reviews.title: Poor app management
reviews.text: This company’s apps / technology are very frustrating to use. I waste so much time having to figure out how to fix issues.

reviews.userName: Don't want to give a nickname
reviews.title: Upgrade made app worse
reviews.text: The upgrades have made the app worse than before. First, what took three clicks to get to a workout now takes six or more. They have added pictures that fill up the screen to make it pretty but took away ease of use.  Second, before the upgrade I could cast the video from my phone to a tv and see the video on both screens. This is very helpful so that my phone can be on the floor when I’m there for the workout. Now, the phone is blank. I contacted support and they said tough luck—it’s just the way the new app is designed. So, for a so-called upgraded app that now costs more per month you get less functionality. What a deal. Once the pandemic ends I look forward to canceling my subscription.

reviews.title: Best kickboxing/MMA available, bigtime!
reviews.text: I’ve been kickboxing and lifting weights at home for 20 years, and discovering MOSSA Fight on Xbox a few years ago truly brought me to a new level of badassery and fun. When Xbox got rid of it I was at a loss, so I got in touch with MOSSA and they released the workouts via DVD first, then streaming. These workouts use the BEST music you will find. The workouts truly use the music - for example, with a punch or kick you might hear breaking glass. Or during weight lifting, they will time each lift to the beat but the beat is varied, like: 1,2,3 (pause) 4! (Repeat). Believe me you will want to turn up the volume and the time will fly! After 20 years it was great to learn some new MMA moves too, several actually. I also enjoy their Centergy series, it’s a mash up of yoga and Pilates, great balance work too. There is something for everyone: dance, yoga, weights, step, bike, HIIT, etc. They have 10 minute workouts that you can combine to get a variety, or just do when short on time. Most workouts are 30 minutes so you could do two different ones. And recently they’ve added 60 minute workouts. I’ve been streaming this for a few years, since they started it and each year we got new additions. The app always works for me via my Apple TV without issues unlike my other fitness program. I’ve never left an app review before but I figured it’s time for me to show my appreciation to MOSSA and try to spread the word. Amazing music, trainers and workouts.

reviews.title: Blast!
reviews.text: Best at home cardio burner! Tones your legs!

reviews.title: Paid and can’t use the app
reviews.text:
I have been paying for several
Months and every time I try to click on class it ask to subscribe but I’m already a paying customer... my acct renews on 14 th every month and I have not be able to access one class for months!!! I have tried emailing and haven’t gotten any support! VERY FRUSTRATING

reviews.title: Still moving!
reviews.text: Will update to 5 stars... Looking forward to the new material and the 60 minute workouts! Love the multi directional movements and balanced exercise routines.

reviews.title: Doesn’t let me log in
reviews.text: So I had this app for a few months and it was great. Loved the work outs and even bought all the equipment. Well, I resubscribed and all the app does is crap. Tried my fire stick, iPad, and iPhone. Just keeps telling me to activate my already activated subscription. After 2days of the same thing over and over, I cancelled. Not worth my time or stress to try to log in.

reviews.title: Excellent workouts.
reviews.text: I enjoy the mossa series workouts. My only complaint is that new workouts should be added more frequently. Ie. core

reviews.title: MOSSA Move
reviews.text: Love MOSSA MOVE classes on their app!  They have a variety of different classes that keep you motivated.   Some of my favorites are fight, blast, core, and power! The best part is that you can go at your own level giving you instructors on the platform showing you what to do!  MOSSA has helped me stay in shape during this pandemic!

reviews.title: Auto subscription not working
reviews.text: I signed up for an Auto subscription for MOSSA Move, it has been processing the past few months. It did not auto renew in August. When I try to manually renew, it just says pending, and now I can’t access the app! What do I do? I tried to report a problem to Apple, but they don’t address these issues - is it a problem with this app? Please help!

reviews.title: Great workouts
reviews.text: Workouts are great even without equipment. Almost like being back at the gym!

reviews.title: MOSSA MOVE ROCKS!
reviews.text:
Who says you need 60 minutes or more per workout session to improve your health and fitness???? These 30-minute, cutting edge programs are packed with energy, awesome soundtracks and the world’s BEST instructors! 

The 30-minute formats are a great compliment to the 60-minute MOSSA programs offered in elite clubs world-wide. It is nice that they are not simply a ‘club class’ watered down to a half hour. They have different moves and a totally different training effect.

Thank you MOSSA for your continued push to make exercise more innovative, fun and accessible to all.

PS: for those who haven’t tried a ‘live’ class at a club, find a gym in your area that offers these amazing, results-driven programs!

~Peggy Gregor

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.text: Great exercise and fitness levels options!! Just need more groove classes!

reviews.title: Great Routines—Still Slow on Adding Content
reviews.text: It’s still disappointing to me that they rarely add new content. And now a video that has been there for more than a year is labeled as new which is a little confusing. But what is there is great quality and makes me eager for more!

reviews.title: Slowwwww
reviews.text: The app, nor the website, are able to handle the number of people that are signing up right now. It’s terrible. Please update to handle the capacity.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text:
Update: will not work with Vizio smart cast. Unfortunately for me that’s big tv in the room with the most space. 
Works well with chrome cast. 

Mossa workouts have helped me lose weight. Programs are fun, and never get dull. Many great programs to try. 

I used the app on the Xbox when it came out, and I’m glad they have made an app now!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.text: Love how simple it is to navigate the app. I mostly login on my laptop to do the workouts. The 30 minute format is the right amount of time for each workout and if I’m feeling good I’ll do. Second. I would love to see Centergy added to the list of workouts.

reviews.title: Awesome workouts! App Functions need improvement.
reviews.text: I love doing the Fight and Core workouts on this app. Great music, energetic trainers, a lot of work and a lot of fun. There are some functions that need improvements, however. If I need to pause the workout to refill my water or catch my breath, the entire workout starts over and there is no option to fast forward or backward to find where I left off. Is there a fix to this yet?

reviews.title: About time
reviews.text: I have been waiting for this app since Xbox got rid of Xbox fitness. I’m super excited to get back to my workout routine.

reviews.title: 편리하게 퀵서비스를 부를 수 있음
reviews.text: 비교적 저렴한 가격에 빠르게 퀵을 부를 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 결제수단을 미리 등록할 수 있는 메뉴가 있으면 좋을꺼 같습니다. 결제방식을 몰라서 따로 계좌정보를 받아서 입금하였습니다.

reviews.title: 가격이 너무 합리적입니다
reviews.text:
주문번호 1045635
일단 가격이 너무 저렴합니다.
일반 퀵으로 15만원 정도 였는데, 어플로 5만원대가 나와서 추가금 나와도 저렴할거 같아 주문을 했습니다. 하지만 추가금도 없었고 아저씨가 불친절 하지도 않았습니다. 업무상 퀵 사용할 일이 많은데 이 어플만 사용할 것 같습니다.
하나 아쉬웠던 점은 주문 완료 후 확인 문자같은게 더 확실히 왔으면 좋겠습니다. 제가 기사님께 직접 연락을 드려 확인 했습니다.

reviews.title: 1인 가구에게 제격
reviews.text:
#919290
혼자 사는 사람에게 최고의 서비스입니다
짐이 아주 적지도 아주 많지도 않아서 애매할 때 고고엑스를 이용하면 좋습니다. 
기사님과의 매칭도 바로 신속하게 되고 이사건수가 높은 기사님을 만나니 더 마음 편히 이사할 수 있었어요. 주변에도 꼭 추천하고 싶은 서비스입니다!

reviews.title: 취소
reviews.text: 기사님들이 자꾸 취소해요;;

reviews.title: 깔끔해서 좋다. 다만 개선이 조금 더 좋을듯.
reviews.text:
#744737

앱이 군더더기가 없는게 취향입니다. 다만 가격 추가되는 요소들을 더 친절히 표기해주면, 운송 앱에서는 독보적이 될 것 같습니다!

reviews.title: 고고엑스 편해요
reviews.text:
이용 내역 : 라보 + cost for help 추가 결제 

주문 번호: 709324
좋았던 점 :
1. 원하는 시간대에 빠르게 예약을 잡을 수 있었습니다. 요청하자마자 2분도 안돼 예약승인이 됐습니다. 택시부르는 것 처럼 용달을 부를 수 있다니 정말 편했습니다. 

2. 기사님이 친절 하십니다. 예약 후 전화로 침대조립 요청을 드렸고 연장을 모두 챙겨와주셨습니다. 약속시간보다 5분 일찍 도착해 물건을 싣어 주셨습니다. 집에도 안전하게 옮겨주셨습니다. 가족 3명이 같이 옮기긴했지만 엘리베이터없는 건물이라 예상보다 힘드셨을 것 같습니다. 

개선하면 좋을 점 : 
1. 현금결제를 신청하면 기사님 휴대폰에는 쿠폰 적용이 안된 금액이 보이는 듯 합니다. 쿠폰이 무용지물이네여. 

2. 기본금 25000 + 추가인건비 8000원 - 할인쿠폰 3000원 = 30000원인데 , 결론적으로 5만원을 부르셨습니다. 이 가격이 문제라기보다, 어플 내에서 층수별 가격, 조립비용 등을 좀 현실감있게 반영할 여지가 있을 것 같습니다. 사용자입장에서는 실제금액을 대충이나마 예상하고 서비스를 예약할 수 있으니까요. 

서비스 관리하시느라 수고가 많으십니다~~ 두번째이용인데 아주아주 편하게 이용하고 있습니다

reviews.title: 리뷰
reviews.text:
기본적으로 어플 사용하는데 큰 문제는 없음.
다만 품목에 대해 기사님 실사 방문이 어려워서
실제 단가와 다르게 측정됨.
기사님 코멘트에 의하면 견적과 실제 비용 차이가 나는 경우가 빈번하다고 합니다.
정확한 견적은 요청자가 자세히 기재하여야 견적대로 진행되는 것이 많겠지만, 이 부분에 대해서 개선하면 더 좋을 것 같습니다

i am so glad i used gogox for my move. i moved cities within korea (1.5 hours away) and gogox were able to find me a mover in the same day i submitted my quote onto the app. he actually spoke english and called me to confirm the size of my furniture and information. he also allowed myself and my boyfriend to ride in the truck with him for an additional charge. he was super quick and efficient at loading and unloading all of my things. absolutely recommend to anyone moving within korea!!!

I was nervous about using an app for moving at first, but gogox was amazing! They found a driver within a day, and they’re so affordable! The driver was so kind and helpful, as well~~ I highly recommend gogox anytime that you’re moving

reviews.title: 편하고 좋아요~
reviews.text: 타어플보다 간편하고 쉽고 이사할때 진짜 좋네요~

reviews.title: 빠르고 간편한 고고엑스
reviews.text:
중고 가구 거래가 필요해서 처음 이용했습니다.

택시 부르는 것 처럼 간편하게 부를 수 있고
무엇보다 운송 차량 종류를 선택할 수 있는게
신기 하더군요. 

“즉시 호출”로 연락했는데, 
2-3분 내로 운송기사님 컨택이 왔고
방문해주신 기사님도 친절하셨습니다.

중고 거래가 점점 흥하고 있는데
고고엑스도 서비스 개발 많이하셔서 
더 번창 하세요~

reviews.title: 다시 돌아가신 용달 기사님
reviews.text:
#491081

당일 이사를 위해 라보 기사님을 요청했으나, 밴 차량 기사님이 배정되었습니다. 통화를 하여, 대략적인 짐 용량을 다시 말씀 드려 밴이 수용가능할지 문의드렸으나 가능하다고 말씀 하셨습니다. 문제는 이사 당일에 발생했습니다. 다음 세입자분과 교차로 전출/전입되는 상황이었는데, 밴 기사님께서 짐이 너무 많아 수용이 안될 것 같으니 다른 용달을 부를 것을 요청하셨습니다. 부랴부랴 10군데 전화끝에 다른 용달을 이용하였고, 고고엑스 기사님은 기름값 1만원을 요구하셔서 정신이 없어 그저 드린 후 보내드렸고, 새로 오신 용달 기사님과 겨우 이사를 마칠 수 있었습니다.

처음엔 황당하고 당황스러웠으나, 이사를 마치고 다시 생각해보니 어플리케이션 서비스라 한계가 있었으며 저와 기사님의 상황이 이해가 되어 고고엑스에 보완되었으면 하는 점를 남겨 드립니다.

1. 이삿짐 기준으로, 짐이라는 건 싸다보면 늘어날 수 있습니다. 그러나 고고엑스는 최초 짐 설정을 기준으로 이에 맞는 기사님과 차량이 배정되기 때문에, 어플 외로 기사님과 계속 전화 및 문자를 하며 커뮤니케이션을 해야 합니다. 수용이 안될 것 같으면 어느 한쪽이 서비스를 취소하면 되는데, 이때 정보의 비대칭이 발생할 수 있어 요청자 입장에서는 취소하기가 애매해집니다. 기사님이 수용할 수 있다고 하면, 그저 믿고 갈 수 밖에 없는데 최악의 경우 당일 어그러질 수 있어 사전에 고고엑스에서 이에 대한 공지사항 또는 주의사항을 상세히 안내하는 것이 좋을 것 같습니다.

2. 기사님께는 고고엑스 측에서 어떻게 관리하시는지 모르겠지만, 우버나 타다처럼 소비자가 원하면 이용 가능한 기사님을 배정해주는 앱 시스템인 것 같습니다. 그러나 앱에 최초 입력한 짐의 양보다 늘어날 경우, 그래서 기사님 차량에 수용이 안될 경우를 대비하여 기사님들에게 안내 메뉴얼 등이 필요할 것 같습니다. Ex.) 무리가 되면 취소를 해주세요 등.

3. 최초 입력한 짐의 양이 변하지 않는다면 앱 하나로 기사님을 배정해주시고, 균일가로 운영되어 이쪽 저쪽 기사님을 일일이 알아보지 않아도 된다는 점은 정말 유용한 앱인 것 같습니다. 그러나 그만큼 예기치 못한 상황에 대비한 융통성이 갖춰지면 더욱 지속가능한 앱으로 발전할 수 있을 것 같습니다. 당일 이용하지 못하고 가신 기사님께 기름값 1만원을 생각해보면, 요구하실 수 있다고 생각하나 한편으로는 사전에 “밴이 제가 가진 짐을 수용할 수 있나요?”했을 때 가능하다고 하셨기에 믿고 진행했던 것이었습니다. 그동안 저와 연락하시고, 친절히 응대해주시고, 당일 급하게 시간을 앞당기는 등 죄송하고 감사한 마음에 요청하신 기름값을 드렸으나 이에 대한 혼란은 앱 사용에 대한 미숙함 때문이라고도 생각합니다. 결국 기사님도 저도 윈윈하지 못해버린 것이죠.

이러한 융통적인 부분을 계속 개선해 나가신다면 더욱 발전하는 앱이 될 것 같습니다. 향후에도 이용할 수 있도록 개선되기를 바랍니다. 감사합니다.

#468411
그동안 전화로 용달 부르던거에 비해서 훨씬 싸게 진행 할 수 있었습니다
주소지와 연락처를 일일이 전화로 말 하지 않아도 되어서 정말 편했습니다
기사님 프로필과 연락처도 받을 수 있어 신뢰가 갔습니다
개인적으로 용달일을 덕분에 편하게 보았고 앞으로 계속 사용할 생각 입니다

reviews.title: 잘 썼어요~
reviews.text:
Order #: 450869, 448709

먼저 진짜 편한 앱이라고 생각합니다! 용달 서비스 자체가 기존에 전화를 해서 불러야 하고 정보를 모르는 상태에서 긴가민가하게 불러야 했다는 단점이 있었는데 그 점이 해소되었다는 게 가장 좋습니다. 덕분에 저는 이사를 정말 저렴하게 했어요. 

하지만 사용자 경험 및 인터페이스 측면에서, 제가 용달/차종에 지식이 전무하고 새로 유입되는 유저라는 점에서 저는 어느정도 도움이 더 필요했다고 생각해요. 저는 라보와 포터의 차이를 몰랐고, 라보라고 적어두시고 highway 운전이 불가능하다고하니 저는 이해가 안 갔습니다. 올림픽대로를 건너는 트럭을 많이 봐왔으니까요. 더 큰 차가 있다는 것도 UI가 힌트를 주는 데에 실패했다고 생각해요. 아이콘끼리 크기도 꽤 비슷했고요(어느 정도 그럴만한 부분이라고 생각하긴 합니다). 모르고 라보를 불렀는데, 저는 제가 잘못된 차량을 불렀다는 걸 한참 뒤에야 알았습니다. 하지만 어쩔 수는 없었어요.. 그리고 라보를 불렀는데 밴이 오더라구요, 저는 높이도 좀 중요했어서 조금 당황했지만 기사님께 사전에 연락드려 여쭤볼 수 있게 되어 있어서 다행히 확인받고 다 옮겼어요.

추가로, 사용자는 결정을 만들기 전에 비교를 하기도 하고 많은 것을 계산해보기도 합니다. 저는 끊임없이 앱을 켰다 껐다 하며 비교했어요. 그래서 매번 이름과 번호를 다 적어야만 가격 조회가 가능했던 거, 진짜 불편했어요. 주소는 가격을 조회하기에 필수적이고 이해할만한 부분이지만 이름과 번호는 실제로 주문을 할 때 필요한 부분이거든요. Missing information이 있으면 실제로 구매를 할 때 에러로 처리하며 입력하도록 하는 게 낫다고 생각합니다. 

이래저래 피드백을 꼭 드리고 싶었어서 장문으로 남겼지만, 저는 용달에 대한 진입 장벽 자체가 낮아지고(아저씨 대하는 거 무섭습니다ㅋㅋ), 간편해져서 정말 좋았어요. 좋은 서비스 만들어주셔서 감사합니다. 그리고 영어 패치가 완벽하지 않아 한글이 중간중간 나왔어도 영어가 지원되는 것도 좋았어요 :) 한글이 나온 부분들도 한국어로 적혀있어도 이해할만한 것들이었어요. 큼직큼직하게는 다 잘 되어 있었습니다. 서비스가 더 잘 성장하면 좋겠습니다!

아, 기본 25000에서 자꾸 기사님들이 리퀘스트 일단 받고 취소하셔서 팁 포함 31200으로 올리고서야 확실한 게 잡혔고.. 이사하고서는 육만원 부르셔서 ㅠㅠ 조금 당황..

reviews.title: 자취방 이사
reviews.text:
자취 이사할 때 썼습니다. 

주문 취소라던지 디테일한 옵션은 어플에서 볼 수 없어서 좀 갑갑한 감이 있었습니다. 

비가 올 거 같아서 밴으로 불렀는데 1톤이 배정되더라구요. 그래서 전화로 바꿔달라고 했습니다. 어플 주문 보단 전화가 좀 더 편한 거 같습니다. 

주문 내용과 달리 짐이 많아 두 번 옮기게 되었는데 가격 어떻게 할지는 이야기 나눠 정했습니다. 처음 정해진 가격과 많이 달라졌지만 직접 조율할 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 

어플로 쉽게 부를 수 있다는 점, 정해진 것과 달리 말로 다 바꿀 수 있단 점이 좋았습니다. 

주문번호 #438757

reviews.title: 이사 서비스 이용 만족합니다
reviews.text:
방한칸 짐들 가지고 이사해야 돼서 고고밴 처음 이용했는데, 만족스럽습니다. 
기사님 서글서글 인사도 잘 하시고(어머니가 나중에 칭찬하셨음)
교통상황 때문에 10분 정도 도착이 늦었는데, 도로 정체상황 사진 찍어 보내며 도착 예정 시간 바로바로 알려줘서 안심하고 기다렸어요. 
책이 많아서 박스가 무거운데 상처나지 않게 잘 날라줬고요. 
이사만 아니라 소량 물품 보낼 일 있을 때도 이용할 생각입니다. 
주문번호 : #367209

reviews.title: 아직 개선 여지가 아주 많아보임
reviews.text:
1. 가격이 그렇게 싸지 않음 
2. 앱 UX 매우 불편함. 개발자 선에서 개선 가능한게 많아보임. 위치 기반 상세 위치 추정. 스크롤시 키보드 숨기기 등 
3. 카드결제 안되고 기사님은 현금만 가능하다고 함.

reviews.title: Lugg Service
reviews.text: Lugg service was perfect movers where great arrived on time and handle all my needs will use Lugg again in the future

reviews.title: no accountability
reviews.text:
My luggers came unprepared, actively damaged my furniture as i specifically told them exactly what not to do.

I had to tell them to leave and stop touching my property, they were here 12 minutes and charged me as if they arrived 90 minutes before i requested them, and left 60-90min after they did.

The Lugg app gave them 5 stars and a positive review I did not write.  I am unable to edit the review and if I click any rating but 5 stars the app disappears.

IT APPEARS to crash but does not, it hides in the background.

I hope everyone who wrote a line of code for this behavior or stamped it for release has engaged in conspiracy to commit interstate wire fraud.

That’s a criminal felony.

SCARIER?! Apple will probably ban every single one of you from ever touching anything in the app store again.  Or I will sick the DOJ on Apple for criminal negligence.

reviews.title: Sunday Same Day
reviews.text: I was really thrilled to find this company. I’ll spare the long story about how I got myself in this situation, but I had to move a brand new, huge (77in), expensive and fragile OLED TV on. Sunday. Lugg connected me with two nice and incredibly professional movers who showed up on time and did a great job. They listened to all my instructions and took great care of my TV. Not only did they do it the same day, again on a Sunday, but they charged me substantially less than what the store was going to charge me for delivery 4 days from now. This app is very, very good!

reviews.title: Unreliable shady company with poor service
reviews.text: They will book you for a time and not show up. Very poor and disjointed customer service. I suggest using any other delivery option you can find. This is not reliable.

reviews.title: Damaged Items
reviews.text: Movers dropped my refrigerator and damaged both my washer and dryer. Lugg is not taking responsibility to replace the damaged items. Please be wary of this company

reviews.title: Fast - professional - polite
reviews.text: This was my first time using Lugg and I cannot be happier. The whole process from booking to delivery was less than 90 minutes. The two Luggers were extremely polite, very professional and very efficient! Very nice job!

reviews.title: Marvin and Art were great!
reviews.text: Marvin and Art were friendly and worked quickly with a GREAT attitude. Wonderful experience and would have them out again.

reviews.title: Move to storage
reviews.text: The team that came out to me were so wonderful very helpful willing to go above and beyond and just really appreciate it being a single person moving myself. I definitely needed that help.

reviews.title: Great app. Love the guys who helped us move
reviews.text: Davi and Julio were great helps. Lugg made the whole process super easy. 10/10 would recommend 🙌

reviews.title: Hire a Professional
reviews.text: I was charged $200 more than the estimate for one large item and they did not complete the job. Use a local mover instead.

reviews.title: Misleading charges
reviews.text: The movers did a good job however, they arrived early and I was charged for every minute they were there. I thought I was going to be charged for labor which was what it stated. It was 47 minutes and 15 minutes of labor. I will not be using this service again.

reviews.title: Painless
reviews.text: Never have to rent a U-Haul or beg a friend with a truck again. Hallelujah. It took 2 minutes to order a truck to help with a pickup. I actually can't believe how easy this whole thing was. I Definitely will be telling everyone about this app.

reviews.title: Great service!
reviews.text: Great experience. On time, friendly, helpful delivery guys who put my plants where I needed them. Delivery was done within an hour of when I requested it. Will definitive this app again!

reviews.title: So expensive
reviews.text: This app makes it so expensive, you are better off getting movers or taskrsbbit. I wanted move my couch I bought on fb marketplace to my new place but they took a long time and (they charge per minute!!) it came out to be way more than expected. Also their van fees are crazy. On top of that the guys were complaining the whole time about the heaviness of the couch… for the price they charge they didn’t seem very professional

reviews.title: Move small apartment
reviews.text: Thank YOU Douglas and Robert for being so efficient on moving our small apartment to our new apartment.

reviews.title: Wow Guys!’ Phenomenal Job!!
reviews.text:
Efficient 
Positive
Careful 
Fast 
Excellent!! 

Great job! 

Will Definitely hit you up if something else needs moved! 

Great to experience Lugg!

reviews.title: Let LUGG Lug it!
reviews.text: I used LUGG to move my new Soulcycle bike from my BFF’s to my home. *Noel and *Krishna were  kind, intentional, mindful and just plain nice. They particularly mindful of the screen and the handled the bike like they were delivering it to one of their own homes. Arrived a little outside of the agreed delivery window but they were worth the wait, and life happens! Totally satisfied LUGG #loyalist xoLisa

reviews.title: So expensive to be honest they said 47$ and it’s charge me 128 how is that happened I felt cheated
reviews.text: I want an explanation!!!!

reviews.title: Fraudulent Service
reviews.text: I have used the Lugg app a few times to make moved between apartments. It is a valuable service, however unfortunately it is wrought with fraud. The first time was great, because they came right away, moved the few items, and charged a small amount due to efficiency. The second time, the movers purposefully took the long way to the drop off spot to run up my tab, then they broke my dresser and lied about it. The third time, the movers arrived at the location at 12:11 to start the clock on their “labor minutes” but never called or messaged me. I opened the app and saw them driving away at 12:14. I called them, and they said they had to talk to police about a speeding ticket they received on the way over. Then they finally started work at 1pm, wasting 49 labor minutes at my expense, costing me an extra $112.70. I posted a 4 star review for the movers complaining about this and quickly got an email from Lugg explaining how they calculated their charges and making excuses. They finally issued me a refund of only $34.50, which is criminal activity. They owed me $112.70 and refused to make the adjustment despite having a full GPS tracking history of each of the vehicle’s movements as well as my communications with the Luggers. BEWARE of false charges!

reviews.title: Jet sets.  Owner. Film production
reviews.text:
For me with my experience with Lugg! This company this app has always been on it thanks very much

He was amazing. He did not complain about the traffic on 37 lol I’ve driven it many times and it has not been fun not even once but he said no problem great attitude.

reviews.title: Wasn’t what I ordered
reviews.text:
I order had a few things to move. I ordered and paid for a sprinter van that per dimensions would fit my bed frame. They showed up with a smaller church van that did not fit my bed frame and did not have the tools with them to take it apart. On my move out day required me to find an alternative means to move my bed frame. 

They did not offer to reimburse me for the difference in cost of vans.

reviews.title: Great way to make life easier!!
reviews.text: John and Saxon were great!  Thanks again!!

reviews.title: A great app and great service
reviews.text: Great app to book support for a move. Great to see live time updates and a map. Also great for communication.

reviews.title: Love Lugg…but
reviews.text:
I use Lugg all the time as I am an organizer and regularly emptying houses or moving things for my clients. 

I wish I could add ONE contact number to each scheduled appt so everyone stays in touch. I don’t want LUGG to have access to ALL my contacts. Please add this feature!

reviews.title: Great service in a flash🚀
reviews.text: Our move in date was moved up so I was panicking about coordinating the move! A friend told me about Lugg and it was so simple and transparent! I could choose every element of the move and it gave me an estimate I could work with! Movers were on time, packed everything with care and efficiency👍I’d use them again in a heartbeat ✨👍

reviews.title: Great service

reviews.title: Doesn’t Allow My Common Address
reviews.text: The DSL is of only allowing 1240 address. It won’t allow me 1245 address number. The DSL map located is flawed for San Francisco. Stupid!

reviews.title: Joke of an app.
reviews.text: Buyer beware, do not use this app. Do yourself a huge favor and search for any other comparable business. I was charged $134 after an incomplete delivery, (charged by the minute for “labor” at the drop off point when nothing was dropped off) and was told after the fact that they’re supposed to ask for an alternative drop off location (which they did not). When I brought it up to support, they told me it’s not on them and didn’t offer up a single bit of help other than reiterating their legal policies. Absolute garbage app and service.

reviews.title: Exactly what you need.
reviews.text: Moving from a hotel after 3 months with all my stuff was made so much easier! Quick and Efficient for sure!

reviews.title: Lugg drivers ripped us off
reviews.text:
We are new to Lugg and we’re so excited to use what seemed to be such a cost effective and simple solution to such a common problem for so many people.  

The task was simple: pick up a bed from one house A, deliver to bedroom at house B. 

1) my husband and I have five children and were in between multiple locations so we carefully selected the only window of time the lugg app had available in order to accommodate the seller and to be available to be there to receive the bed.  We were supposed to get a call when Lugg was on their way to the pick up location (so I could then notify the seller of the item and try to get to the pick up location to inspect the item and handle any instructions.  We only got a call from Lugg driver once he had arrived at pick up location. 

2) when Lugg driver arrived at delivery location, he rang doorbell and indicated that the instructions only said to deliver the bed but didn’t say anything about taking the bed to the upstairs bedroom.  Since this is my first time using the app, I had no idea I had to he so specific about a bed delivery since I was paying for two guys, a delivery fee + a labor rate by the minute. Isn’t that supposed to cover the time the luggers are delivering your items to the appropriate place at your address?

3)  They then asked us to pay them cash, “outside of Lugg” for having to carry the bed to a bedroom in the house.  Which, we did, hesitantly, since this whole situation started feeling sketchy but we were caught between a rock and hard place.  If we weren’t willing to give them the cash, what would have happened? Would they have just dumped the bed in our driveway in the rain/etc. and left it there?!?  We aren’t physically capable of carrying the bed from our driveway into the house which is the whole reason we used Lugg in the first place!!! 

4) Well, since we then had to go to atm to get them the cash they requested, they sat in the driveway in their truck and then when they had been paid and left the house, I get a notification from the app that the guys left the house and I was now being charged for 43 minutes of time they just sat there in their truck for cash!!! We got screwed and this is not right! I am furious and feel dooped.

reviews.title: Poor Response to Damage claims - Inadequate Compensation Offered
reviews.text: I hired Lugg on August 1, 2024, and their movers caused significant damage to my hardwood floors. I provided detailed photos, videos, and a professional repair estimate from a reputable flooring company, totaling $6,880. Despite this, Lugg’s claims department only offered $838.50, claiming the full repairs were “out of scope,” even though the estimate directly addressed the damage they caused. I’ve repeatedly referenced these details in emails, but Lugg has failed to respond adequately or resolve the issue. Their handling of this situation is unacceptable, and I would not recommend their services.

reviews.title: Do not USE THIS COMPANY

Despite sending an automated message to email a support like that will respond ASAP I am still waiting for a response to that email after it being sent at 6:24. My scheduled pickup and drop off was for 6-7pm ordered 24 hours before from a business that spoke highly of them. 6:48 I find out a team has not even been assigned to my order. They corresponded with the business more than me asking for the business to have me change my order to next day.

reviews.text: One word BAD. I worked with this company for a short period and my honest opinion is they lack professionals from customer service all the way down the totem poll to the labors. No discussion no investigation.. Believe me I’ve tried. I’ve even went a step further and equipped, myself with a body camera to have footage of these moves. Booked by Lugg and let me tell you bad bad bad unprofessional from beginning to end and I have the proof my profile will show you. I have over 100 moves, but one bad review due to Lugg telling individuals that we can do the impossible. Once again, I have proof screenshots of messages videos email sent. to Customer Service and let me tell you they do not care so don’t waste your time working or booking any moves to this company trash

reviews.text:
I’ve hired a lot of movers from here over the last couple of years.

They can do anything from picking things up from FB marketplace to an entire move!

At least where I live, they can often show up same day our next day and definitely within three or four days. It’s incredibly helpful!

One thing is, they will even move furniture around in your own home — you don’t need to be moving it somewhere else. I have found that extra helpful. 

There are a couple of movers. I have not thought we’re so great but most of them have really been good great or excellent and I will continue to use service often.

reviews.title: Seemed Helpful in Theory
reviews.text:
Most idiotic product fail, can’t even blame UX. Like any other share economy service, the people doing the work are awesome, the people making the product are dropping the ball on the customers and their gig employees.

For some unknowable reason the platform will let you search the needed destination or service, and even offer suggestions on destinations and allow you to schedule, whether that location is open or not. And you as the customer are supposed to assume against the reason implied by being allowed to schedule for that place and time, that the destination may not be open and call to confirm before booking (which could also result in you losing the available booking time).

If the LUGG suggested destination isn’t open, you will have to find an alternate location or have the item returned to you - all of which incur continued per minute labor fee on top of the flat rate and labor fee being charged from the moment they left your pick up address. Preventable of the backend booking system actually spoke to the scheduling system OR a simple destructive action warning prior to booking something that is potentially closed. Absolutely unhinged product thinking.

reviews.title: Rick and Brian are the best!

reviews.text: The first time we used Lugg it was great. The movers were on time and everything was great. 2nd time I booked Lugg we were ghosted. I got a message 15 min before our pickup  window that the luggers were finishing their last Lugg and we would get an ETA shortly. We waited and waited and heard nothing.  After our window passed I tried customer service and they told me they “hoped” to have movers assigned soon. The store we bought from closed so they helped us get our furniture outside. Thankfully a friend came to our rescue and I canceled the Lugg. I’ll be double checking to make sure I didn’t get charged. Won’t be using this service again.

reviews.text:

I have things moved all the time by professional companies that give you an estimate and generally stick to it. I wanted to try this service and I’ll never touch it again. 

What should have been (when I use normal, professional services) a $350 job was $500. Again - I move things a lot, I make furniture, and know the costs and time involved.

reviews.title: They are ridiculous
reviews.text: This was my second time booking lugg and I had horrible experience. The first time everything went so well hence I booked it second time however this time it turned out to be a huge disappointment. Here’s what happened I scheduled lugg for some reason they were not on time they were supposed to deliver it by 6 but they took one extra hour both drivers taking their own time. At first they arrived at pick up location late then what we scheduled took ample of time to load 4 mini wardrobe and took their sweet time to arrive at drop off location then they had this issue to find out the building it was so hard to coordinate with them as there was language barrier instead of hiring two luggers my partner had to help them to move stuff after all this they charged me $229 while I booked for $50 and now there is no one to help me with my concerns all I can do is talk to bot! Is this the way to help customers? The first time I booked lugg I had this giant cal mattress to be picked and drop and it was with one lugger I had no issues everything went so well and this time even after having two luggers this many issues I had to deal with top of that why should I pay unexpected amount for your staff mistake completely not acceptable. I need someone to answer my concerns just chatting with a bot won’t help. Please get back to me if you value your customers and their concerns please 🙏🏼

I was told when I hired these guys, they would bring base in, set it up and make sure it works. Now I am stuck trying to figure out this on my own.
